{"id": 12, "body": {"name": "DevHub DevRel Contributor Report by Lyudmil for 03/03/2024 - 17/03/2024", "summary": "Decentralized DevRel Contribution Report by Lyudmil Covering 3rd March - 17th March ", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**Meetings**\\\\nWeekly StandUps, Syncs, internal and other teams\\\\nTotal hours: 6.05\\\\n\\\\n**Support Public Channels**\\\\n13.10h\\\\n\\\\n**Contributions**:\\\\nDonation, Factory, Guestbook examples and docs\\\\nTotal Hours 5.30h\\\\n\\\\n**Tools Community Call #4**\\\\nTotal hours: 2.1h\\\\n\\\\n**Other:**\\\\nJC marketing help\\\\nHackerEarth Judging\\\\nMisc\\\\nTotal hours: 2.30h\\\\n\\\\n**Pragma & ETH London:**\\\\nPreparation, General event support, \\\\nTechnical Support, Judging, travel\\\\nTotal Hours:  39.30h\\\\n\\\\n**Reimbursements:**\\\\nPlane tickets: $287.57\\\\nAccommodation: $334.59\\\\nTransportation: $37.05\\\\nMeals: $129.00\\\\n\\\\n\\\\\\\\**Receipts available upon request\\\\n\\\\nTotal Hours: 68.15\\\\nHourly Rate: $50/h\\\\n\\\\nTotal: $ 3,407.5\\\\nTotal reimbursement: $788.21\\\\n\\\\n**Grand Total:** $4,195.71\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "flmel.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "4196", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"body": {"name": "BOS Notifications App funding", "summary": "The BOS Notification app needs to be funded to update the iOS version of the app and pay for its infrastructure.", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "The project was successfully launched in autumn 2023. You can download the app from the following links:\\\\n1. [BOS Notifications on Apple App Store](https://apps.apple.com/bg/app/bos-notifications/id6473671841)\\\\n2. [BOS Notifications on Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vlmoon.nearsocialnotifications)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nAfter this, the BOS Notification app was successfully funded to develop the second version. We now have over 800 users, according to analytics .\\\\n\\\\n###  Breakdown of Costs\\\\n- Update IOS version of the app - 200$\\\\n- AWS costs for Lake Indexer Framework - ~ $180/month\\\\n- Firebase - $0/month\\\\n- Backend for Push Notificaitons - $14/month\\\\n- **Total**: $1184 for 6 months\\\\n\\\\n### Previous Funding\\\\n\\\\n**Funding App Version 1**:\\\\n- [Link to funding details](https://near.social/devgovgigs.near/widget/gigs-board.pages.Post?id=1077)\\\\n\\\\n**Funding Design App Version 2**:\\\\n- [Link to design funding details](https://near.social/devgovgigs.near/widget/gigs-board.pages.Post?id=1471)\\\\n\\\\n**Funding Development App Version 2**:\\\\n- [Link to development funding details](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2922)\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "vlmoon.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1364", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": []}

{"body": {"name": "Fostering Innovation: AI Chain NEAR Tunisia Hackathon", "summary": "We propose the \\\\\\\"AI Chain NEAR Hackathon Tunisia\\\\\\\" to foster innovation and collaboration in the NEAR developer community. This hackathon will empower developers to create innovative AI solutions on the NEAR blockchain, driving ecosystem growth and skill development.", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "nneoma.near", "description": "# Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):\\\\n**Number of Participants:** Target: 60, Achieved: 34\\\\n**Projects Submitted:** Target: 10, Achieved: 7\\\\n**Mentorship Sessions:** Target: 2, Achieved: 2\\\\n**Community Engagement:** Target: 50 Discord members, Achieved: 40\\\\n\\\\n# Event Highlights\\\\n**Hackathon Format:**\\\\nThe hackathon spanned two weeks, with teams of up to 2-3 members. Participants faced challenges in AI and blockchain, using tools NEAR protocol, AI frameworks, and blockchain development kits.\\\\n\\\\n**Participants:**\\\\nOver 34 participants formed  10 teams, including developers and designers  from diverse backgrounds\\\\n\\\\n**Projects:**\\\\nNotable projects include \\\\\\\"Courchain\\\\\\\" , \\\\\\\"El Bey\\\\\\\"  and  \\\\\\\"Handala\\\\\\\" , which integrated AI with NEAR blockchain for transparent transactions. Awards were given for the most innovative solutions, with prizes for first : CourChain, second : El Bey, and third place : Handala.\\\\n                       \\\\n**Sponsors:**\\\\nSponsors included NEAR DevHub and Hackbox and Elaco Coworking Space, whose contributions were crucial. They benefited from brand funding, networking opportunities, and the chance to support cutting-edge innovation.\\\\n\\\\n**Mentorship:**\\\\nMentors provided guidance throughout the event, with sessions highly rated by participants. Feedback highlighted the value of expert insights in refining project ideas.\\\\n\\\\n# Financial Summary\\\\n## Budget Overview:****\\\\nTotal Budget: $1,900\\\\nTotal Expenses: $2,000\\\\nSurplus: $100\\\\n\\\\n**Income Sources:**\\\\nBounties: $1,100\\\\nSponsorships: $1,900\\\\n\\\\n**Expenses:**\\\\nVenue: $ 0,0\\\\nMarketing: $ 200\\\\nPrizes: $1,100\\\\nEquipment and Supplies: $800\\\\nFood and Beverages: $1,000\\\\nActual Amount Spent: $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Financial Performance:**\\\\nThe event stayed within budget, with a surplus of $100. All expenses were managed effectively, ensuring financial stability.\\\\n\\\\n# Participant Feedback\\\\n# Feedback Analysis:\\\\nOverall, participants rated the event highly, praising the organization, content, and opportunities for networking and learning.\\\\n**Suggestions:**\\\\nRequests for more hands-on workshops and longer networking sessions will be considered for future events.\\\\n\\\\n**Lessons Learned**\\\\n**Success Factors:**\\\\nEffective planning, strong mentorship, and active community engagement were key to the event\\\\\\'s success.\\\\n\\\\n**Challenges:**\\\\nTechnical integration issues and tight timelines were challenges. Solutions include earlier preparation and additional technical support.\\\\n\\\\n**Future Plans**\\\\n**Next Steps:**\\\\nPlans are underway for future hackathons, workshops, meetup with tentative dates in September/December 2024. Themes will include advanced AI applications and further blockchain integration and IOT.\\\\n**Improvements**:\\\\nFeedback and lessons learned will be incorporated, with more hands-on workshops, extended networking opportunities, and improved technical support.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "alae.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"handle": "tooling", "community_addon": {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tools Community Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\" The community calls are informal sessions where we share updates, discuss tooling and present projects in the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThese sessions are now at a regular interval taking place **Every Second Tuesday of the month** if you dont want to miss those make sure you follow **[DevHub Community Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/2/r?cid=c_f54ed37fd92327acdc7e4343fe40722ae5797b6c82929ba93e9f3a89c69657ab@group.calendar.google.com&pli=1)**. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIf you want to present your work, suggest discussion topics or simply get in touch - **[Join our Telegram group](https://t.me/NEAR_Tools_Community_Group)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHere are the recaps of our most recent community calls:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #7 Jun 11, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #7](https://i.imgur.com/YBqZjcH.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WrtzgtS5tKE)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Call #7 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WrtzgtS5tKE)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #6: May 14, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #6](https://i.imgur.com/LHXt3u6.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bfCFOwGZCDo)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Call #6 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bfCFOwGZCDo)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- **Zahid** Gives updates on Jutsu.ai and talks about Bento \\\\\\\\n  * Q&A with Zahid\\\\\\\\n- **Jacob** presents NEAR Contract Tools\\\\\\\\n  * Q&A with Jacob\\\\\\\\n  * differences between NEAR Contract Tools and NEAR Contract Tools, \\\\\\\\n  * possibilities for cargo near extensions and collaborations\\\\\\\\n- **Vlad** presents ecosystem updates\\\\\\\\n  * near.cli.rs\\\\\\\\n  * near-jsonrpc-client-rs\\\\\\\\n  * near-api-js \\\\\\\\n  * upcomming rust sdk 5.2.0 that brings IterableMap & IterableSet \\\\\\\\n  * mentions the works of reproducible builds \\\\\\\\n  * presents collaboration opportunities on JS and Rust SDKs \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Links from chat:**\\\\\\\\nhttps://bento.jutsu.ai/\\\\\\\\nhttps://github.com/near/near-sdk-contract-tools\\\\\\\\nhttps://near.org/contractwizard.near/widget/ContractWizardUI\\\\\\\\nhttps://github.com/near/contract-wizard\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #5: Apr 9, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #5](https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreigo3mpikbg2ogjipjonelfbvnrtypx6hkyr3rszaicyi3pgxhwyou)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EDCoWObguVs)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Call #5 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EDCoWObguVs)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- **Vlad** Presents the updates of Rust SDK - v5.1 That reduces the boiler plate necessary for writing smart contracts.\\\\\\\\n Next version coming soon will bring \\\\u{201c}iterable map\\\\u{201d}.\\\\\\\\n- **LedgerApp** rewrite in Rust is complete and going through a formal security audit. Expecting to go live in May\\\\\\\\n- **[Cargo Near](https://github.com/near/cargo-near)** and **rust-sdk** are getting integrated with **SourceScan** making the contracts source code verifiable and discoverable\\\\\\\\n checkout the [NEP-330 here](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/533)\\\\\\\\n- **Morgan** presents **Okashi.dev** rewrite he did for ETH Denver simulating Near environment for interacting with smart contracts in the browser locally :blown:\\\\\\\\n- **Re:Public** showcase their entry for ETH London and present [their roadmap and proposal](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=33)\\\\\\\\n- **[bos-workspace](https://github.com/NEARBuilders/bos-workspace)** had a rewrite making it more modular and easier to be worked with presented by **Elliot**\\\\\\\\n- **Yuval** - tight for record holder attendee of the community calls recaps Q1 and great stats of **LavaNet.xyz** speaks about what\\\\\\'s next\\\\\\\\n- **Zahid** Recaps [Q1 updates](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LuwX8InOQdU&ab_channel=JutsuAI) and [milestones](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/jutsu-devhub-collaboration-q1-milestones-tryjutsu-zacec/?trackingId=pgauiK2OUj2s782z5cIhfw%3D%3D). Shares the [roadmap](https://trello.com/b/NUIKq7dq/jutsu-public-roadmap) for **Jutsu.ai**\\\\\\\\n- **NearBlocks** represented by **Luke** Shares some stats and recent updates supporting our ecosystem.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #4: Wed Mar 6, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #4](https://i.imgur.com/eR30Vrg.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rd3Vn09c-Goi)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Group Call #4 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n**Zahid** demoes copilot and generative UI feature built in** Jutsu.ai**.\\\\\\\\n**Yuval** overviews **LavaNet.xyz **and introduces Lava Points, provides stats of current usage.\\\\\\\\n**Euguene** introduces **FastNear.com** and talks about the infrastructure problems it aiming to solve.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #3: Feb 21, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #3](https://i.imgur.com/UdPKO4F.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube [Tools Community Group Call #3 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- **Oleg Kuzmin** discusses the new implementation of **LedgerApp**.\\\\\\\\n- **Ricardo** presents his team and **AgorApp** https://agorapp.dev.\\\\\\\\n- **Guillermo** shares about recently updated **near-cli** https://github.com/near/near-cli.\\\\\\\\n- **Jaswinder** from Harmonic Guild presents their current work on **near-api-rs** https://github.com/Harmonic-Guild/nea...\\\\\\\\n- **S\\\\u{e9}rgio Seco** introduces **near-relay** https://github.com/SurgeCode/near-relay.\\\\\\\\n- **Frol** talks about **NEAR\\\\\\'s Rust Stack**.\\\\\\\\n- **Zahid** from **Jutsu.ai** gives a last-minute heads-up that breaking changes have been introduced, with more to be announced and discussed on the next community call.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**All sessions can be found on the [DevHub YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vg9LYGLU7ok&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls"}}

{"id": 120, "body": {"name": " Fostering Innovation: AI Chain NEAR Tunisia Hackathon #hacks", "summary": "We propose the \\\\\\\"AI Chain NEAR Hackathon Tunisia\\\\\\\" to foster innovation and collaboration in the NEAR developer community. This hackathon will empower developers to create innovative AI solutions on the NEAR blockchain, driving ecosystem growth and skill development. #hacks ", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "nneoma.near", "description": "# Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):\\\\n**Number of Participants:** Target: 60, Achieved: 34\\\\n**Projects Submitted:** Target: 10, Achieved: 7\\\\n**Mentorship Sessions:** Target: 2, Achieved: 2\\\\n**Community Engagement:** Target: 50 Discord members, Achieved: 40\\\\n**Media :** Please check the media link here : [link](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-pqFWmfDpls_nPdLsZ_wmBAIN5uYvf0l?usp=sharing)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n# Event Highlights\\\\n**Hackathon Format:**\\\\nThe hackathon spanned two weeks, with teams of up to 2-3 members. Participants faced challenges in AI and blockchain, using tools NEAR protocol, AI frameworks, and blockchain development kits.\\\\n\\\\n**Participants:**\\\\nOver 34 participants formed  10 teams, including developers and designers  from diverse backgrounds\\\\n\\\\n**Projects:**\\\\nNotable projects include \\\\\\\"Courchain\\\\\\\" , \\\\\\\"El Bey\\\\\\\"  and  \\\\\\\"Handala\\\\\\\" , which integrated AI with NEAR blockchain for transparent transactions. Awards were given for the most innovative solutions, with prizes for first : CourChain, second : El Bey, and third place : Handala.\\\\n                       \\\\n**Sponsors:**\\\\nSponsors included NEAR DevHub and Hackbox and Elaco Coworking Space, whose contributions were crucial. They benefited from brand funding, networking opportunities, and the chance to support cutting-edge innovation.\\\\n\\\\n**Mentorship:**\\\\nMentors provided guidance throughout the event, with sessions highly rated by participants. Feedback highlighted the value of expert insights in refining project ideas.\\\\n\\\\n# Financial Summary #hacks\\\\n## Budget Overview:****\\\\nTotal Budget: $1,900\\\\nTotal Expenses: $2,000\\\\nSurplus: $100\\\\n\\\\n**Income Sources:**\\\\nBounties: $1,100\\\\nSponsorships: $1,900\\\\n\\\\n**Expenses:**\\\\nVenue: $ 0,0\\\\nMarketing: $ 200\\\\nPrizes: $1,100\\\\nEquipment and Supplies: $800\\\\nFood and Beverages: $1,000\\\\nActual Amount Spent: $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Financial Performance:**\\\\nThe event stayed within budget, with a surplus of $100. All expenses were managed effectively, ensuring financial stability.\\\\n\\\\n# Participant Feedback\\\\n# Feedback Analysis:\\\\nOverall, participants rated the event highly, praising the organization, content, and opportunities for networking and learning.\\\\n**Suggestions:**\\\\nRequests for more hands-on workshops and longer networking sessions will be considered for future events.\\\\n\\\\n**Lessons Learned**\\\\n**Success Factors:**\\\\nEffective planning, strong mentorship, and active community engagement were key to the event\\\\\\'s success.\\\\n\\\\n**Challenges:**\\\\nTechnical integration issues and tight timelines were challenges. Solutions include earlier preparation and additional technical support.\\\\n\\\\n**Future Plans**\\\\n\\\\n**Next Steps:**\\\\nPlans are underway for future hackathons, workshops, meetup with tentative dates in September/December 2024. Themes will include advanced AI applications and further blockchain integration and IOT.\\\\n**Improvements**:\\\\nFeedback and lessons learned will be incorporated, with more hands-on workshops, extended networking opportunities, and improved technical support.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "alae.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}
